name: Little Sonny Jones
description:
'''Johnny "Little Sonny" Jones''' (April 15, 1931 â€“ December 17, 1989) was an American [[New Orleans blues]] singer and songwriter. Over his lengthy career, he worked with various blues musicians, notably [[Fats Domino]].

He is not to be confused with the blues musicians [[Little Sonny]] and [[Little Sonny Warner]].
